channel.title: Move Quickly! - Andrew Young (Drum and Bass)
channel.description: Here’s my first drum and bass track created with Auxy. https://soundcloud.com/andrew-young206/move-quickly

item.title: Move Quickly! - Andrew Young (Drum and Bass)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I like the percussion, interesting choices. I’d take it easy on the crash that happens throughout the drum beats in the first minute or so, happening on every measure is a bit much.

I like the sound that comes in at like 1:00, reminds me of a chip synth a bit and fits the overall vibe. I like the groove at 1:30ish, would have liked to hear more of that you filled it in pretty well.

The melodies seem a little lost, a lack of cohesiveness. I think for a first drum and bass effort though you’re at least on the right track, keep working at it

Read full topic
item.source: Move Quickly! - Andrew Young (Drum and Bass)
